## Asia's best payroll software providers in 2016

[HR Webinar
Series](https://webinars.humanresourcesonline.net/?utm_source=bulletin&utm_medium=intextad&utm_campaign=HRwebinar_2020)
is a comprehensive portal of online learning solutions catered for you.  
4 main themes - Thought Leadership, Personal Growth, Case Studies and COVID-19
Management. [Find out more about the webinars
»](https://webinars.humanresourcesonline.net/?utm_source=bulletin&utm_medium=intextad&utm_campaign=HRwebinar_2020)

During the [Vendors of the Year awards
2016](http://www.humanresourcesonline.net/video-highlights-hr-vendors-year-
awards-2016/ "Video highlights: HR Vendors of the Year Awards 2016"), _Human
Resources_ recognised the biggest achievements of the best payroll software in
Asia. Winning gold in Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong in the Best Payroll
Software award, Ramco Systems won over judges across the board and emerged as
the big winner.

The Vendors of the Year awards, organised by _Human Resources_ magazine, is a
long-running annual report that recognises the best solution providers in Asia
– Singapore, Hong Kong, and Malaysia.

In the 11th year of the research, all winners were determined by a two-tier
selection process. First, the finalists were identified through an extensive
online survey of HR managers in Asia on their preferences.

These finalists then submitted documentation to verify their credentials,
which was [validated by a panel of more than 50 HR
leaders](http://www.humanresourcesonline.net/voty-awards/2016/hk/judges/ "View
the judges list") from some of the region’s largest employers. Here are the
results.

For the **best payroll software in Singapore** :  
**Gold:** Ramco Systems  
**Silver:** Justlogin  
**Bronze:** Excelity Global Solutions

Finalists  
- ADP  
- AGHRM  
- Info-tech Systems Integrators  
- NGA HR  
- PayrollServe  
- Sage Software Asia  
- SAP SucessFactors  
- Talenox  
- TIMES SOFTWARE  
- Unit4 Asia Pacific

**ALSO VIEW:** [Photos from
HR](http://www.humanresourcesonline.net/events/winners-photos-hr-vendors-
year-2016-singapore/ "Winners and photos: HR Vendors of the Year 2016,
Singapore")[ Vendors of the Year 2016 awards,
Singapore](http://www.humanresourcesonline.net/events/winners-photos-hr-
vendors-year-2016-singapore/ "Winners and photos: HR Vendors of the Year 2016,
Singapore")

For the **best payroll software in Malaysia** :  
**Gold:** Ramco Systems  
**Silver:** TIMES SOFTWARE  
**Bronze:** ADP

Finalists  
- Excelity Global Solutions  
- Payroll2U  
- Sage Software  
- SAP SuccessFactors  
- Take5people  
- Unit4 Asia Pacific

**ALSO VIEW:**[Photos from
HR](http://www.humanresourcesonline.net/events/winners-photos-hr-vendors-
year-2016-singapore/ "Winners and photos: HR Vendors of the Year 2016,
Singapore")[ Vendors of the Year 2016 awards,
Malaysia](http://www.humanresourcesonline.net/events/winners-photos-hr-
vendors-year-2016-malaysia/ "Winners and photos: HR Vendors of the Year 2016,
Malaysia")

For the **best payroll software in Hong Kong:**  
**Gold:** Ramco Systems  
**Silver:** Oracle Systems Hong Kong  
**Bronze:** Take5people

**ALSO VIEW:** [Photos from HR Vendors of the Year 2016 awards, Hong
Kong](http://www.humanresourcesonline.net/events/winners-photos-hr-vendors-
year-2016-hong-kong/ "Winners and photos: HR Vendors of the Year 2016, Hong
Kong")
